name: Rock It to Space (full)
description:
AWSD or arrow key controls. Buying control fins allows steering, and buying valves allows throttle control. (slide in the direction you want to move on a touchscreen) P key or pause button to pause and unpause. (there is a delay to prevent pause spamming)

Trailer on youtube and an android app with the same name. (Search pub:protop if you are having trouble finding it) 

If the controls aren’t working, make sure the game is in focus by clicking on it. The full game is also at https://protop.link/rock-it-to-space/.
